amendment.description: To provide for automatic continuing resolutions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3352, under the order of 12/20/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 67. Record Vote Number: 334.

action.text: Amendment SA 3352 proposed by Senator Paul.
